kreport.name: faultreasonByType2

condition.name: billfaultreason
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='工单故障原因' order by d.ordernum

condition.name: itbusinesstype
condition.extend: {ITBUT_1:业务运营类,ITBUT_3:特定系统,ITBUT_4:跨网故障类}

condition.name: itbizfaulttypel2
condition.extend: itbusinesstype:select distinct substr(d.dvalue,1,7) pvalue,d.dname,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='业务故障类型(L2)' and substr(d.dvalue,1,7) in ('ITBUT_1','ITBUT_3','ITBUT_4')

condition.name: area
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' #[and d.dvalue in (${s@user_areas})] order by d.ordernum

data.tbody: ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4}%
data.tfoot: 合计 $[round(${3})] 100%

kreport.ksql: select nvl(rend(st.billfaultreason),'空') 工单故障原因,nvl(st.itbizfaulttypel2Name,'空') 二级故障类型,st.total 工单数,round(st.total*100/t.total,2) 所占比例 from ( select i.billfaultreason,rend(i.itbizfaulttypel2) itbizfaulttypel2Name,count(*) total from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障管理流程 and i.replytime is not null #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.itbusinesstype=${itbusinesstype}] --业务运营，特定系统，跨网 #[and rend(i.itbizfaulttypel2)=${itbizfaulttypel2}] #[and i.billfaultreason=${billfaultreason}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and i.area in (${s@user_areas})] #[and ${isflowITZX}(select 1 from rec_node itn where itn.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and itn.nodecode='8704d4d70a11226800834bbe3cb68d92')--是否流经IT中心管控] #[and i.replytime>=${startDate}] #[and i.replytime<${endDate}] group by i.billfaultreason,rend(i.itbizfaulttypel2) order by i.billfaultreason ) st, ( select count(*) total from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障管理流程 and i.replytime is not null #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.itbusinesstype=${itbusinesstype}] --业务运营，特定系统，跨网 #[and rend(i.itbizfaulttypel2)=${itbizfaulttypel2}] #[and i.billfaultreason=${billfaultreason}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and i.area in (${s@user_areas})] #[and ${isflowITZX}(select 1 from rec_node itn where itn.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and itn.nodecode='8704d4d70a11226800834bbe3cb68d92')--是否流经IT中心管控] #[and i.replytime>=${startDate}] #[and i.replytime<${endDate}] ) t
